name: 1.3.2.Final
body:
- [**Question**] Failed to get offsets by times - Registry with Kafka  [#969](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/969)
- [**Documentation**] Document Protobuf serde classes [#966](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/966)
- [**Documentation**] Document artifact states and transitions [#965](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/965)
- [**Documentation**] Add some documentation for the Avro Datum Provider config [#960](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/960)
- [**closed**] Duplicate definition of infinispan.version in pom.xml [#939](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/939)
- [**Bug**] OkHttp client missing content type headers in requests. [#920](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/920)
- [**Duplicate**][**Task**][**UI**] Ensure auth config properties are pushed to UI from back-end [#905](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/905)
- [**Task**] Ensure that Health, Metrics, and OpenAPI endpoints are not protected by auth (by default) [#902](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/902)
- [**2.0.x**][**Enhancement**][**Impacts Documentation**] Centralize all serdes configuration options [#886](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/886)
- [**Documentation**] Add client SerDes documentation to user guide [#878](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/878)
- [**Documentation**] Docs: Link to registry-rule-types doesn't work [#871](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/871)
- [**Bug**] Registry Rest Client closeable? [#870](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/870)
- [**Bug**] Avro converter does not work in Kafka Connect [#864](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/864)
- [**Documentation**] Add new Registry client documentation [#849](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/849)
- [**Duplicate**][**Enhancement**] Update RegistryRestClient to declare exceptions for common errors (e.g. NotFound) [#847](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/847)
- [**Task**] Print deprecation warning from new Registry Client when appropriate [#840](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/840)
- [**Task**] Create new "end-to-end test" github actions workflow [#775](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/775)
- [**Enhancement**] Ensure logging can be enabled for new registry client [#760](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/760)
- [**Bug**] Incorrect artifact createdOn and modifiedOn date when using Kafka topic storage [#723](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/723)
- [**Bug**] Incompatibility in ccompat api [#700](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/700)
- [**Discussion**] Spring Integration [#699](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/699)
- [**Documentation**] docs: incorrect path in rest api docs [#691](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/691)
- [**Enhancement**] Authentication/authorization proof of concept [#674](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/674)
